UPCOMING TALK

Europe's Retreat from Refugee Protection and Fundamental Rights


Cristina Mas
Journalist, Ara

Lorenzo Gabrielli
Interdisciplinary Research Group on Immigration
Department of Political and Social Sciences, UPF

Universitat Pompeu Fabra
Room 24.104 (Merc√® Rodoreda building, Ciutadella Campus)
27 September 2018
8:00-9:30 PM

Free and Open to the Public

This talk will cover the increasingly repressive immigration policies of the European Union and its member states. From militarized responses to migrants at sea to the criminalization of rescue operations, third country return agreements, and border externalization, Europe has taken a sharp turn away from any commitment to refugee protection and fundamental rights.
